page.title: 21West Pilton Scheme
page.content:
Well av lived in the west pilton for 16 years now and its had a bad rep for Drugs Violence Knife crime Under age drinking and under age Joy Riding The News Papers are never down our area because they dont want to tell everyone how bad places like west pilton and muirhouse really are. Av Seen Alot of Stolen motorbikes , cars and drug dealers selling right in front of everyone because they All know Lothian And Borders police Always Turn Up Late because Nearly Every Time They Park There police cars young yobs smash them with bricks
brandon
